optional.maxcount: INTEGER - Stop after maxcount different fields
optional.abslim: FLOAT - Limit of the maximum absolute difference (default: 0)
optional.rellim: FLOAT - Limit of the maximum relative difference (default: 1)
optional.names: STRING - Consideration of the variable names of only one input file (left/right) or the intersection of both (intersect).

optional.maxcount: INTEGER - Stop after maxcount different fields
optional.abslim: FLOAT - Limit of the maximum absolute difference (default: 0)
optional.rellim: FLOAT - Limit of the maximum relative difference (default: 1)
optional.names: STRING - Consideration of the variable names of only one input file (left/right) or the intersection of both (intersect).

optional.outfile2: STRING - Destination filename for the copy of the input file

optional.printparam: BOOL - Print pack parameters to stdout for each variable
optional.filename: STRING - Read pack parameters from file for each variable\[format: name=<> add_offset=<> scale_factor=<>\]
STRING - Read filter specification per variable from file \[format: varname=\"<filterspec>\"\]

optional.addbits: INTEGER - Add bits to the number of significant bits \[default: 0\]
optional.minbits: INTEGER - Minimum value of the number of bits \[default: 1\]
optional.maxbits: INTEGER - Maximum value of the number of bits \[default: 23\]
optional.numsteps: INTEGER - Set to 1 to run the calculation only in the first time step
optional.numbits: INTEGER - Set number of significant bits
optional.printbits: BOOL - Print max. numbits per variable of 1st timestep to stdout \[format: name=numbits\]
optional.filename: STRING - Read number of significant bits per variable from file \[format: name=numbits\]

optional.ndup: INTEGER - Number of duplicates, default is 2.

optional.skip_same_time: BOOL - Skips all consecutive timesteps with a double entry of the same timestamp.
optional.names: STRING - Fill missing variable names with missing values (union) or use the intersection (intersect).

optional.name: STRING - Comma-separated list of variable names.
optional.param: STRING - Comma-separated list of parameter identifiers.
optional.code: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of code numbers.
optional.level: FLOAT - Comma-separated list of vertical levels.
optional.levrange: FLOAT - First and last value of the level range.
optional.levidx: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of index of levels.
optional.zaxisname: STRING - Comma-separated list of zaxis names.
optional.zaxisnum: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of zaxis numbers.
optional.ltype: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of GRIB level types.
optional.gridname: STRING - Comma-separated list of grid names.
optional.gridnum: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of grid numbers.
optional.steptype: STRING - Comma-separated list of timestep types (constant|avg|accum|min|max|range|diff|sum)
optional.date: STRING - Comma-separated list of dates (format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss).
optional.minute: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of minutes.
optional.hour: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of hours.
optional.day: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of days.
optional.month: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of months.
optional.season: STRING - Comma-separated list of seasons (substring of DJFMAMJJASOND or ANN).
optional.year: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of years.
optional.dom: STRING - Comma-separated list of the day of month (e.g. 29feb).
optional.timestep: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of timesteps. Negative values select timesteps from the end (NetCDF only).
optional.timestep_of_year: INTEGER - Comma-separated list or first/last\[/inc\] range of timesteps of year.
optional.timestepmask: STRING - Read timesteps from a mask file.

optional.mapversion: INTEGER - Format version of the GrADS map file for GRIB1 datasets. Use 1 for a machinespecific version 1 GrADS map file, 2 for a machine independent version 2 GrADS map fileand 4 to support GRIB files >2GB.A version 2 map file can be used only with GrADS version 1.8 or newer.A version 4 map file can be used only with GrADS version 2.0 or newer.The default is 4 for files >2GB, otherwise 2.
